articles.author: Hakyung Kim, Brian Evans
articles.title: S&P 500 ticks higher even as trade tensions worsen: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Stocks seesawed Wednesday as traders looked for a market bottom after days of volatility, despite retaliatory tariffs from China and the European Union.
articles.content: Stocks climbed higher Wednesday afternoon, recovering some of their recent losses, despite retaliatory tariffs from China and the European Union on U.S. goods in the latest escalation of the global t… [+2718 chars]
